effect.name: Wind Sway with Antialiasing
effect.description: Make a sprite sway and bend, like it is affected by the wind.
effect.author: NaitorStudios

parameter.name: Time
parameter.description: You must hook Fusion's timer to this.

parameter.name: Speed
parameter.description: The speed of the wind movement.

parameter.name: Min Strength
parameter.description: The minimal strength of the wind movement.

parameter.name: Max Strength
parameter.description: The maximal strength of the wind movement.

parameter.name: Strength Scale
parameter.description: Scale factor for the wind strength. The bigger the number the more tilted it canl get.

parameter.name: Interval
parameter.description: The time between minimal and maximal strength changes.

parameter.name: Detail
parameter.description: The detail (number of waves) of the wind movement.

parameter.name: Height Offset
parameter.description: The height where the wind begins to move.

parameter.name: Distortion Height Offset
parameter.description: The height where the wind begins to bend the object.

parameter.name: Movement Offset
parameter.description: Offset the movement for each object to make each one more unique.
